name: Space Shooter (itch) (CutePotato)
description:
This is a Arcade-style shooter game, developed in a short period of time.

In this endless shooter game, you get access to an endless map and  6 different spaceships!

You have 3 Powerups:

  • Shield
  • TripleShot
  • Boost

Blast enemies and have fun with explosions!

Controls:

WASD/arrow keys - movement

click/Lcrlt/Space - shooting

hope you enjoy it!
